job_history.work_description: Completes classroom and on-the-job training to acquire, exercise, and maintain knowledge of the duties required to perform all inspection task ranging from First Article inspections to process inspections. Reviewing written quality or inspection procedures for adequacy and evaluating the implementation and effectiveness of quality/inspection systems, including work plans.

Performs acceptance inspection on all inbound aircraft to assess the total damage before beginning overall Reset. Orders necessary components to complete Aircraft reset Prioritized workload and preliminary mechanical inspection of critical flight controls.

Qualified to perform various inspections on a periodic basis to include Phase, hydraulic, landing gear and flight control inspections. Implements risk management techniques while performing quality maintenance and inspections on the F/A-18 aircraft.

Installed/replaced pneumatic actuators and servos, landing gear and flight controls on the F/A-18 hornet. On board the USS Nimitz CVN-68 Aircraft Carrier for a six-month deployment during Operation Iraqi Freedom.

skills.name: Quality Control
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in quality control inspection, reviewing procedures, and evaluating implementation and effectiveness of quality systems, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Aircraft Maintenance
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in aircraft maintenance, including inspections, repairs, and replacements of various components, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Aviation Structural Mechanics
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in performing inspections, repairs, and replacements of aircraft structural components, including pneumatic actuators, servos, landing gear, and flight controls, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Implemented risk management techniques while performing quality maintenance and inspections, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct leadership experience mentioned, but held a grade E-5 position, suggesting some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Prioritized workload and performed preliminary mechanical inspections, suggesting some practical experience in project management.

skills.name: Technical Inspection
skills.explanation: Performed various inspections, including Phase, hydraulic, landing gear, and flight control inspections, showing strong proficiency.
